entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • signalr different "backends" for different hubs #38611
  • System.BadImageFormatException raised at random in deployed Azure App Service #38609
  • IIS functional test improvements #38608
  • Error using Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis 6.0.0 #38606
  • Http/3 :status static response compression missing values #38604
  • Razor component wrong format. #38603
  • Update MouseEventArgs. Add MovementX MovementY #38602
  • Layout in project templates with individual auth is no longer centered in 6.0 apps #38600
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" after upgrading from .NET5 to .NET6 #38599
  • Razor Class Library - Static Web Assets that are being built during the pack process don't get added in Net6.0 #38596
  • Razor page not escaping @ in attributes #38595
  • SignalR Java Library method "On" not calling error when class type has wrong parameters #38593
  • Update StartupAnalyzer to recommend calling UseStatusCodePages after UseRouting #38591
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Clone StartupAnalyzer in to Framework analyzers #38590
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor WebAssembly Hosted w/Individual Accounts does not work published to IIS. Multiple issues won't load. #38589
  • Blazor+WASM+Static hosting: Is the advice to use a fallback Brotli decoder correct? #38587
  • > I am trying to access IWebHostEnvironment in a class library, referenced by my web project. It contains my business logic. #38586
  • Blazor server side prefix url #38584

Closed

  • Pseudo header string reuse broken in .NET 6 #38581
  • Feature 'Edit and Continue' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #38594
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #38529
  • [Blazor] Investigate why CanUseComponentAndStaticContentFromExternalNuGetPackage fails on CI #34679
    7.0-preview1
  • [SPA] Add Connection: Keep-Alive header to the proxied requests #37681
    7.0-preview1
  • AuthorizeRouteView is missing the Policy Property #38525
  • Loading `appsettings.json` with 600 lines of "data" is very slow in blazor wasm #38555
  • Cannot use "checked" as variable name in razor file #38588
  • @microsoft/signalr V6.0.0 is not working on react-native apps #38286
    7.0-preview1
  • SkipStatusCodePagesAttribute should run before AuthorizeAttribute #10317
    17.1-Preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • HTTP/3: Remove request-only headers from enumerator #38610
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Use all static status values #38605
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Use window.document for React-Native #38598
    area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • Visual Studio 2022 Release installation #38592
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7.0

Merged

  • Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38509
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Write static header names #38565
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix Kestrel psuedo header reuse #38585
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Use servicing template text in backport bot #38601
    7.0-preview1
  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Remove TCS allocation with resettable value source #38560
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Split IISFunctionals startup/shadow copy tests #38575
    area-runtime
  • Don't copy authorization header during redirects in MvcTesting #38557
    area-mvc
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Verify Roslyn compiler changes #38362
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
